name: Cinema 4D Layout
summary: An L4D file is a settings file created by Maxon Cinema 4D, a 3D modeling application. It saves a workspace layout and includes the positions of toolbars, palettes, and the editing canvas. Cinema 4D users save and load L4D files to preserve workspace configurations, including when setting up single or dual monitor configurations.

open.note: Open with an associated app listed below.

images.caption: L4D file open in Maxon Cinema 4D 2023
